resources.string: This is the debug screen. However this text will dissapear when data arrives from the server.

--- BUG FIXES
*Fixed local echo text dissapearing after re-entering the window.
*Alias dialog updates.
*Issue with NAWS data not being sent on device rotation.

--- NEW FEATURES
*Support for xterm 256 color codes.
*Alias line matching options.

Visit the website for more details!
http://bt.happygoatstudios.com

---- TEST VERSION 3----
*Better disconnection handling and lifecycle handling.
*Android 3.0 enhancements.
*More options for hyperlinks.

---- TEST VERSION 2 ----
*Performance update for clickable links.
*xterm 256 background color fix.
*Fixed an issue with xterm256 colors bleeding incorrectly.
*Changed "xterm-256" TTYPE reporting to "BlowTorch-256color"

---- TEST VERSION 1 ----
*Clickable link implementation. No options at this time.
